gw.cc.financials.check.entity

Interface CheckSearchView


  • public interface CheckSearchView
    CheckSearchView View entity for efficiently displaying Checks on the Payment/Check search page.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDisplayedBulkInvoiceNumber()
      Returns the invoice number of the BulkInvoice associated with the BulkInvoiceItem of this Check, or "<none>" if this Check is not bulked.
      CurrencyAmountPair getGrossCurrencyAmount()
      GrossAmount property as a CurrencyAmount (to allow multicurrency display).
      CurrencyAmount getGrossTransactionCurrencyAmount()
      GrossAmount of the check in the transaction currency as a CurrencyAmount so that the correct currency icon is displayed.
      boolean isBulked()
      Tests whether this check is part of a bulk payment (i.e., it's tied to a BulkInvoiceItem).

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayedBulkInvoiceNumber

        java.lang.String getDisplayedBulkInvoiceNumber()
        Returns the invoice number of the BulkInvoice associated with the BulkInvoiceItem of this Check, or "<none>" if this Check is not bulked.
        Returns:
        BulkInvoice number associated with this Check

      • isBulked

        boolean isBulked()
        Tests whether this check is part of a bulk payment (i.e., it's tied to a BulkInvoiceItem).
        Returns:
        true if this is a bulked check, else false

      • getGrossCurrencyAmount

        CurrencyAmountPair getGrossCurrencyAmount()
        GrossAmount property as a CurrencyAmount (to allow multicurrency display).
        Returns:
        GrossAmount as a CurrencyAmount

      • getGrossTransactionCurrencyAmount

        CurrencyAmount getGrossTransactionCurrencyAmount()
        GrossAmount of the check in the transaction currency as a CurrencyAmount so that the correct currency icon is displayed. However, even if this check was not written in the claim's currency only the transaction currency amount will be displayed.
        Returns:
        the Transaction Gross Amount as a CurrencyAmount
